data.title: Giant in the Playground Forums
data.meta_description:
Well, I know that vs. threads have by this point sort of gone the way of the dinosaur, which is fine by me, but I had this idea the other day: what are some good vs. matches between characters played by the same actor? 
 
Some examples: 
Jayne Cobb vs. John Casey (Adam Baldwin) 
Batman vs. John Preston (Christian Bale) 
Ned Stark vs. Boromir (Sean Bean) 
Indiana Jones vs. Han Solo (Harrison Ford) 
 
And I do mean good match-ups, not ones that would be utter curb-stomps.  I'm pretty sure Nathan
